name: auto-model
description: This script creates, from a given train dataset, an OptiML, a Fusionwith its best models, and a dataset with the predictions for the test dataset

inputs.name: optiml-id
inputs.description: OptiML id from previous executions, to bypass the creation of the resource. (e.g. optiml/5cd15343eba31d247a0009a7)

outputs.name: output-optiml-id
outputs.description: OptiML created from the given train dataset
